rooms.description: Open-plan living area with wheelchair accessible paths and minimalistic design adhering to Brutalist aesthetics
Fully integrated open kitchen, designed for ease of access and functionality in a single space with the living area
Private bedroom featuring wheelchair accessible design, simple finishes, and minimalistic Brutalist elements
Second private bedroom with similar accessibility features and modern simplicity
Accessible bathroom designed for convenience and safety

openings.description: Main entrance positioned in the north to follow Vastu guidelines
Garage door for two-car parking access with ample clearance for wheelchair mobility
